questions.question: Who is said to have died at the beginning of the chapter?

choices.answer: Mrs. Radley
Miss Rachel
Aunt Alexandra
Nobody is said to have died at this point in the story.

questions.question: For what reason does Scout say that the world is ending?

choices.answer: Buildings in the town are catching fire.
Jem refuses to go outside and play with her.
It is snowing outside.
She has to get ready to go to school.

questions.question: Why is Jem and Scout's idea to build a snowman met with difficulty?

choices.answer: Scout keeps eating all of the snow.
There is not enough snow sticking to build one.
Atticus won't let them.
Scout is too scared of the snow to go outside.

questions.question: Who is the snowman Jem and Scout make supposed to look like?

choices.answer: Boo Radley
Miss Maudie
Mr. Avery
Atticus

questions.question: Why does Atticus wake Scout and Jem up in the middle of the night?

choices.answer: Their house is on fire.
Calpurnia is missing.
Miss Maudie's house is on fire.
He does not wake them up at night but in the morning.

questions.question: How does Mr. Avery escape Miss Maudie's house?

choices.answer: He pushes through a window and slides down a pillar.
He jumps from the roof and is caught by the firemen.
He runs out the front door before the house collapses.
He unfortunately does not escape.

questions.question: What does Atticus point out the morning after the fire?

choices.answer: Not everyone in town came to help put the fire out.
Miss Maudie lost many of her possessions in the fire.
Jem is shaken up by the events of the night before.
Scout is wearing a blanket that does not belong to her.

questions.question: Who does Atticus reveal to be the person who gave Scout the blanket?

choices.answer: Miss Maudie
Calpurnia
Boo Radley
Walter Cunningham

questions.question: How does Miss Maudie react to her now destroyed house?

choices.answer: She's optimistic & says she has always wanted a small house
She is distraught and is caught rummaging through the rubble
She is angry and blames Boo Radley for starting the fire
She decides to move to a new town to start fresh

questions.question: What do Jem and Scout name their snowman?

choices.answer: Mr. Avery
The Other Radley Brother
Atticus Finch
The Morphodite
